content: आकूतं [आ-कू-भावे-क्त] {@--1@} Meaning, intention, purpose; इतीरिताकूतमनीलवाजिनं <ls>Ki. 14. 26.</ls> {@--2@} A feeling, state of heart, emotion; चूडामंडलबंधनं तरलयत्याकूतजो वेपथुः <ls>U. 5. 36</ls>; भावाकूतं <ls>Amaru. 4</ls>; <ls>Sāṅ. K. 31</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 11</ls>; स्नेहाकूत <ls>U. 6. 35</ls>; साकूतं feelingly, meaningly (<ab>oft.</ab> occurring in plays as a stage-direction). {@--3@} Wonder or curiosity; सर्वं °करं <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Wish, desire.
